attributes.action: Do not allow the government to pass the use of Neonicotinodis.
attributes.additional_details: Neonicotinodis has been banned in the EU for good reason as it is extremely poisonous. We cannot allow the government to start using it!
attributes.background: Do not allow the passing of Neonicotinodis in the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Continue the ban on the use of Neonicotinoids: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563943

Overturn the decision to allow the use of neonicotinoid pesticides: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569214
